Package com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.graphics

Classes used to overlay text and images on the camera preview display and video stream

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WZBitmap
    The WZBitmap class can be used to display a bitmap as an overlay on a WZCameraView by registering an instance as a frame listener using WZCameraView.registerFrameListener(WZRenderAPI.VideoFrameListener)
    WZText
    The WZText class can be used to display text as an overlay on a WZCameraView
    WZTextManager  
    WZTextManager.Font  

Package com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.graphics Description
